UploadAppPackage(String, String, String, String)

Upload an App package (APK or IPA) to the browserstack server

Declaration
public static async Task<string> UploadAppPackage(string username, string accessKey, string packagePath, string targetUrl = "https://api-cloud.browserstack.com/app-automate/upload")
Parameters
Type Name Description
System.String username

User Name (can be retrived via app-automate.browserstack.com)
System.String accessKey

Access Key (can be retrived via app-automate.browserstack.com)
System.String packagePath

The Full path of package file (.apk or .ipa)
System.String targetUrl

The target server to upload, default value: https://api-cloud.browserstack.com/app-automate/upload

Returns
Type Description
System.Threading.Tasks.Task<System.String>

app_url, used to identify the application on the target modile device
